content.detailedDescription: I was with a group of friends watching the old home days fireworks in north walpole new hampshire. about 2 minutes after the fireworks began, i noticed an object west of us. the lights were white red and green of the same strength sequentially and slowly changing colors. the object moved back and forth, further away and closer to the fireworks. the object moved quickly and stopped quickly, hovering the moving again. the object made no noise. at the end of the fireworks the light was just red and didnt change. i lost sight of it after that. there is artifact light from the street light in the videos. the object is at times directly above the street light but at a distance.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Nothing ive ever seen before

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the recliner in the living room at approximately 1a.M. on a cloudy, starless night.  i looked out the window and saw six bright, glowing objects hovering in the sky.  they were not moving at this time.  they were arranged like stair steps, and you could have drawn a diagonal line through them.  i knew they weren't stars because it was a cloudy night and a person can't see the stars in town anyway.  they were also slightly bigger and brighter than airplanes.  they had a yellow-orange glow.  i prayed to god asking what it was and stood up with my ipad to take a picture.  they began to move in a scattered motion: some went up, some down, some side to side.  they did not move in a linear path.  it was more like they just scattered from their diagonal arrangement.  one by one they faded into the sky. it was as if the lights on each one just grew dimmer and dimmer until you could no longer see them.  i watched as the last one faded and disappeared.  the entire display lasted about 30 seconds.  the picture(s) i took do not do the scene justice because they were much larger and brighter in person.  it could not have been planes because of the eerie way the hovered brightly and then just scattered in every direction until they could no longer be seen.
content.summary: Approximately six bright glowing lights hovering in a stair-step arrangement in sky.  i went to take pictures and they scattered in different directions before fading one by one.

content.detailedDescription: Orange light. didn't move. less than 1 minute. disappeared. not airplane or meteor. it was very bright then suddenly 'went out'. we'd love to hear an explanation
content.summary: Orange light. didn't move. less than 1 minute. disappeared. not airplane or meteor.

content.detailedDescription:
Over the past 2 years- i have had 8 sightings. 

i moved from raleigh to winston-salem and continued to have sightings.

my twin brother recently moved to nyc and was on a rooftop in brooklyn and saw orange orbs on a rooftop. someone posted recently on mufon that they saw the same thing in brooklyn- same night.


i have been living with my twin for the past 2 years. i moved to raleigh and got an apartment, while he stayed in winston-salem for a week.

the first night i was in my apartment, i was sleeping on the floor in my room next to a big window. i woke up and opened my eyes and could see through the window- i knew that i closed the blinds before i went to sleep- so i immediately knew somebody came through that window. i jumped up and checked my phone to see that it was 2:38 am. that was the time i remembered checking my phone before i went to sleep. i checked the living room to see if my friend was asleep and i calmed down and went back to sleep.

the window was messed up the next day.

this is the first time in my life, i've ever woken up thinking that somebody had intruded in my household. i have never experienced a feeling like that.

i wokeup that morning with an imprint on my arm- that i thought was cool so i took 2 pictures of it. 

3 days later- i came home from the hookah bar and i had a perfect circle on my hand. i started to take pictures of it- and as i went through the pictures i took to make sure i had a good enough quality photo, i saw the pictures of the imprints on my arm from the first night i stayed there.

i started to panic and feel a strong anxiety because the imprint on my arm was physically impossible. i slept on a jacket and a sweater, and my right arm was free from being pressed on anything. i slept on my left arm. i started to think that i was abducted and after a few minutes of freaking out, i decided to go to sleep and re-evaluate these "coincidences" the next morning. when my brother and i went to our bedroom to sleep, we saw a mark on the wall. my brother went up to look at it and started having a panic attack. we had not noticed the print on the wall earlier that day- it was a consistent design, and we knew something had came in our apartment at some point- we both had panic attacks and left the house. when we got in the car it was 2:30am and i had another panic attack thinking i would be abducted as we were driving down the road (it was close to 2:38am) the brand new washing machine had a crack in the lcd screen as well. 

this is a very intricate story- so it is hard to piece together all the occurrences.  

the next night a good friend wanted to hangout with my brother- and i began to feel as if i had a choice to hangout with them or stay home and sleep. (i was still recovering from this experience) i decided to go with them.
 side note: as we walked out of the apartment i noticed there was two rabbits sitting 5 feet away from each other, perfectly, yet they were facing two different directions. 

we rode with our friend down the highway and saw the blood moon for the first time in our lives. that night i had a spiritual awakening that i was with the energy of life. time did not exist and i felt the unity of all being. i knew what the answer to my problems were. i sat completely still in a meditative position for 5-6 hours. i have never felt so much at peace. we were dropped off at our apartment the next morning, and the rabbits were in the same position that they were when we left, expect they were both facing the same direction. i felt at peace when i saw these rabbits. 

a few days later i was at the rose garden in raleigh and a man with long hair was doing a standing meditation in the middle of the outdoor amphitheatre. my brother and i asked our friend if we should meditate with him and she said "no, he probably doesn't want you too" we walked up to a friend we were meeting and asked again "should we meditate with 
him?" and she goes "no." i said "xena, if you were humble you would meditate with him" her friend that we did not know sounded like a prophet and says "if you were truly humble, you wouldn't have to ask him to meditate, you would just do it" 

so we went to meditate with him. i immediately went deep into my meditation and a question came to mind. "if i was messed with by extra-terrestrials, why would they leave behind evidence?" and my mind gave me a direct answer "the hostility of humans has become so severe, that it has begun to bleed into the balance of the universe. these beings would never intrude on our privacy, and mess with us in our sleep, they would ask for permission before doing so- and my mind told me "the situation here on earth, regarding the interdependency of not only earth, but the universe, has become so severe that these beings are having to break their own rules, their own morals, to reach us in a way that we can affect other people" they are having to play our game in order to communicate with us. i feel a strong sense of urgency when it comes to the path of the human race as a species. we have to be willing to communicate with these beings, before they help us. without full disclosure of this subject, we will never ascend to this god consciousness that they want us to connect with.

in the midst of this i have learned that for the universe, and these beings, there is a very strict rule of life for everyone - non-interference. they are not allowed to interfere with our evolution directly, without our consent and understanding. 

i need to speak with someone soon. i am moving to new york city within the next week and i am willing to meet with a field investigator in the city if possible.

i am a very reasonable and logical thinker when it comes to this- i had put this entire subject on the back-burner in my mind, since my friends have pushed themselves away from me due to what i tell them.
the only thing keeping me on this subject, is my dreams. i had a dream last week that i was on the brink of sleep paralysis and i decided i did not want to be paralyzed in my dream, and i was shot straight into space. i looked at the stars and it was a beautiful view. the same night i had a dream someone tried to hand me a child, the child had soft blonde hair and big blue eyes. (i have brown hair and hazel eyes) i knew the child wasn't mine, but i was pressured to hold the child as my own. i didn't want to hold this child, but i did and i wokeup. 



after my spiritual awakening i began having massive pulsing headaches for a few days after. lines on the side of my head appeared, and four prominent balls showed up on my forehead. it felt like growing pains. like i said, a lot of things happened in this week span of time.

the hand print is still on my wall- i would love for someone to come test the material that left the print on my wall!
content.summary: Wokeup in the middle of the night

content.detailedDescription: Witness contacted oregon mufon asst. sd regarding an apparent implant removed from right adenoid or other glandular passage in his throat.  object has been secured by oregon sd and will be submitted for analysis.  additional sighting experiences related dating back to approximatedly 1946 or 1947.  these will be described in the complete report.
content.summary: Foreign object came out of right adenoid, per witness

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting in the back yard so that i could smoke an after brunch cigarette and facing the se. dragonflies and butterflies, among other bugs and birds were flying around. i love watching them all so i try to catch every movement. in front of me but at a good long distance away, a movement caught my eye and i watched it zip from my right to left a short distance and disappear all within three seconds. as it faded, there were some leaves and limbs in the path of my view from a certain point and the object was never seen through it nor from the other side of it. the edges were somewhat blurry like a heat signature but the color and details were clearer than i would have expected. it was about two inches long by 1/4 inch wide, yellow like a bee with black detail or windows, maybe both, on the top half. i only saw it for 3 seconds and still can't believe how much i saw since i can't even see the details on a dragonfly flying by but i can see it's shape and wings. after it registered in my head that it was not a normal object i told my husband what i saw and we discussed it. i didn't want to report it but then decided if there was a similar report that i would report it. doing a search in the data base for a cigar, gold to copper, the first person revealed seems to have seen a similar object just a couple of weeks ago so here i am.
content.summary: Long, thin, yellow with black detail or windows on the top half.

content.detailedDescription:
About 9:05 pm on 7/31/14, i left my home & was traveling in a southeasterly direction to run an errand when i saw two bright almost oval orange lights in the sky.  these lights were not really high in the sky, nor directly over me, more like in the sky in front of me.
i stopped my vehicle to look more closely, thinking it may be a meteorite falling from the sky.  however, the orange lights did not blink or fall from the sky.  they were moving through the sky almost horizontally.  they were fairly close together, like military planes in formation, but the lights were bright & much larger, similar to the little red blinking light on an airplane...Maybe as much as 5-10x the size.
i opened my window on my vehicle, to ascertain whether i could hear any sound of an engine.  i heard nothing but some traffic from a nearby intersection.  then i noticed a third identical light following the first two, though the distance between the last two was 3x the distance between the first two lights.  i thought it was strange but after sitting in my vehicle looking up for ~1-2 minutes decided to continue to my destination a 1/4 mile away to see if i could still see them.  i came to a red traffic light intersection where there were street lights.  i stopped at the red light. at this time, i thought "oh shoot, i should try & take a photo with my cell phone".   the lights were farther away at this point & didn't appear as large, but i did snap a photo anyway. however, i thought it probably didn't turn out due to the glare of traffic & street lights. in addition, the orange non-blinking lights were much farther away by this time, & appeared more the size of the red blinking lights on an airplane flying high in the sky, though they were still not blinking. i kept looking around to see if anyone in the other cars saw them & when a car coming the opposite way ran the red light, i believed they too might be pulling into the cvs parking lot to stop & look up at the sky.  but they didn't.
i pulled into the parking lot & turned away from the store & got out of my car to try & take another photo.  this time i saw 4 lights, though the one that had been first in line was so far away, it no longer appeared orange & not as bright as the other & were going northeast. i do not believe more than 4-5 minutes passed from the time i saw the first two orange lights until i took the 2nd & final photo.
i went into the store to pick up my items & when i came out about 5-8 min later, i saw nothing in sky but a sliver of a moon in the opposite direction.  i returned home  & at this point, i told my husband that i saw strange bright orange lights in the sky, but was really confused as to what they could have been.  this was the first time i looked at the photos i took.  surprisingly, the photos did not show the orange lights i saw with the naked eye but rather crescent shaped lights.
content.summary: Saw 4 orange lights in sky.

content.detailedDescription: Me, my mother and stepfather were sitting on the deck out back by the pool. my stepfather was looking west for birds when he noticed this object and said to us, what's that? a balloon? quickly realizing it's not following the wind heading east. he grabbed the binoculars as my mother and i found it. this is where the video starts. it was just enough to focus in with your bare eyes. it was shaped like a barrel, overblown to the point of bowing. the "wooden slats" now spaced apart from the bowing appeared to be a metal, greyish in color. with at least two, possibly three horizontal straps made of the same metal. the interior if you will was close to a deflated football tight against the straps but wrinkled from being half flat. from what we could see through the binoculars it had roughly the same texture as the football.  my stepfather and i both agree we "seemed to see" a teardrop tip on top. it was hovering and rotating, gaining and losing altitude, slowly heading north northwest starting out where we perceived the columbia international airport is, if not over it, definitely in their direct airspace with at least one commercial airplane taking off not but a half mile or so away. unfortunately the plane didn't make the video. we watched it for 15 minutes with no new surprises until it was too small to see where we perceived to be lake murray.
content.summary: This object rotated slowly in a basic direction gaining and losing altitude through columbia international airport airspace and then some. .

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking up. saw a star then it was moving and began to think it was moving and it was. next thought was it is an airliner and then if disappeared like it left the atmosphere. just odd that it was to the east moving south like a jet and then it was gone. no clouds very clear night
content.summary: Watched what i thought was a jetliner in distance then disappeared on a clear night. like it left the atmosphere

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were in her back yard in costa mesa ca on july 21, 2014.   she is close to the orange county airport and we're used to planes and airport traffic.  it was one of the clearest nights i can remember in socal.  so many bright stars and planets and they seemed to be forming shapes....V's, squares, rectangles, triangles...Very unusual but visible alignments. i was facing the se and she was facing me.  out of nowhere, i saw a giant, neon-green blob appear in the sky for a few seconds and i can only describe it as like a blob of paint.  it floated for a few seconds and disappeared behind some trees. there wasn't much movement or distance between its appearing and then disappearing. it was slow, fluid movement like a blob of paint.  i jumped and said - did you see that?
she turned quickly, but it was gone.  however, she was looking in my direction and what she saw was a greenish-yellow light that completely lit me up. it started at my feet and went up, lighting up me and the metal bbq grill behind me and disappeared. i did not see a light with the green blob. we both have lived in that area for many years and are used to airport traffic, but nothing lights up a person or the sky like that, not even a police heli with a spotlight. there was no sound. 

earlier in the evening (around 6:00), i observed two white, small objects floating high in the sky.  they were small and slowly floated across half of the sky at the same speed and keeping the same distance between them until they disappeared in the clouds.  i would have said it was mylar balloons, but they traveled quite a distance in the sky, same speed and same distance between and that seemed odd.

i am a believer in ufo's and unknown beings/things, but my friend is not.  she is now fairly freaked out because of what we saw.  it's interesting to watch when a logical person sees something that can't be explained with logic.

another friend had seen an article and picture about a ufo harvesting energy from the sun and she found the article again after i told them about the event.  the picture was from soho and it showed the exact neon green color that i saw. the harvesting energy picture was also from july 21.

i don't know if i saw a blob of the energy they were harvesting or what, but it was not something from our earthly technology.

i'm happy to answer any questions.   love the hangar 1, ufo files on h2.
thanks,
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: I saw giant neon-green blob in sky.  friend, facing me, said i was lighted up with greenish light, toe to head, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: On friday august 1, 2014 at approximately 9:55 p.M., clear sky, ~78f and a light breeze 2 of us were walking ssw on stillwood lane in northwest austin, 78757.  as we were approaching the intersection of briarwood lane and stillwood lane we observed in the southern night sky at approximately 40 degrees above horizon, perhaps a few miles up in the air, what appeared to be a one of the brighter stars in the night sky moving approximately nne at somewhat slightly above the normal velocity for a commercial airliner.  the most notable characteristic was that the star-like light was constant and did not waver at all.  this compared to all the other planes, satellites and other moving objects in the austin night sky.  this observation occurred for perhaps just under a minute.  then as we continued walking and watching the ufo began moving away from the main part of the cityscape.  it was at this time the object started to speed up a bit, ascend rather quickly and sort of fade out (into a dark yellowish-to browinish, shrinking light) and sped up during it's ascent.  from the time it started to really speed up and ascend to it's final "flickering" out was perhaps 15-20 seconds.  in total the witnessed event occurred for approximately a minute and a half and then the light disappeared off into the nne night sky, sort of following the path of northbound ih-35.
content.summary: Ufo crosses austin sky

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south, southeast on highway 54 and as i was coming up the hill nearing the stoplight i noticed something in the sky. at first i thought it was a jet, but as i got closer i realized it wasn't. it was in the shape of a cigar or blimp. it looked to be silver, but was reflecting light from the sun starting to go down also. a combination of red, orange, and yellow. as i neared the top of the hill it started moving west, but not very fast. once i became even with it you could barely make the end of it. after that i couldn't see it anymore due to traffic and surroundings. the side profile looked to have at least two levels, but because of the sun reflecting off of it, i couldn't make out any windows. there was like a steamy haze coming around it, but no exhaust like on a jet. it didn't appear to have wings. it looked longer than a commercial jet. we don't have many commercial jets fly over us because of our location. we do however have a-10's fly over all the time and the occasional stealth bomber. this craft was flying higher than the military jets do, but lower than commercial jets do. we do have small airports with cessna's and such and it looked to be flying at the levels that the small craft fly. i don't know if it made noise, my windows were up in my truck.
content.summary: Was driving and caught what i thought was a jet, but as it became more visible was not.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the back porch. i looked up and a big red light was flying over my apartments then it changed direction and got super high and blinked out then came back and disappeared behind a cloud. it was only red no other lights. my boyfriend saw it as well. at first i thought it was a plane or helicopter. i recorded it and it was not like anything i have seen before. it reminded me of a hot air balloon, but it got way to high for that.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Big red light, close at first then changed direction, got super high and blinked out

content.detailedDescription: On 28 june 2014, an 11 year old girl staycationing at the hotel sofitel manila with her family chanced upon a married couple who used to coach at her school. the couple told her they were staying at the hotel too to celebrate their wedding anniversary. the girl took out her mobile phone and took several pictures of the couple as they lounged waiting for the sunset on a grassy area of the hotel facing manila bay. the girl immediately uploaded the first picture she took to her instagram. a friend saw the post, didn't notice the coaches, but commented that the picture was that of a ufo. the girl looked at the picture she posted and said that she did not see the object when she took the photo. according to her, there was nothing in the area that resembled the object in size or shape at the time. she was simply taking pictures of manila bay with the man and woman. she posted a second photo of the same scene, taken immediately after the first one, and the object was no longer there. the girl's friend, who also happens to be a minor, showed me the pictures. i suggested that they send the pics to mufon. they requested me to do that for them and emailed me the 2 pictures.
content.summary: 2 pictures of same scene, taken a few seconds apart. one showed a strange hovering object, which was not observed by the naked eye.

content.detailedDescription:
on tuesday july 29th at 4:30pm as i was driving n/b on martin luther king way a reflection of light in the sky caught my attention. this was a beautiful sunny day with no clouds in the sky. i observed sunlight reflecting off of a round-smooth metallic (chrome) ball in the sky. it appeared to be hovering about 500 feet over boeing field. as the object began moving very slowly to the n/w i could see it clearly. there were no markings on it and appeared to be perfectly smooth and chrome in color. it’s hard to judge the size because of nothing near it to compare to but i’m guessing it was about the size of a house.
    as i watched the object move slowly to the n/w it seemed to “fade out” or blend into the sky (i could still see the shape of it). i continued watching it until it went completely out of view. i kept looking in the area to hopefully see it again. the round metallic object reappeared and began to slowly ascend straight up- then it just disappeared!
content.summary: Round metallic object moving slowly to the n/w

content.detailedDescription: Was walking by the necker river in the city of heilbronn in sep at 11:00 11:30 was a bit cloudy a plane in the distance and i see for about 8 to 10 sec a sliver spear with what looked like a seam going around it in a cross form almost rivit like seam and it looked like it opened up or can morhp into something else when it opens.It was kinda big about as big as a van or a little bigger!No sound went into some clouds and vannished!.And it seamed to be shimmering also like it wasnt real!.A mirage like wave around it wierd!..I have seen the same spear on youtube and other ufo web places!..I think its a probe?.I,ve seen many things in my lifetime and been interested in the ufo phen and paranormal for over 35 years!.
content.summary: Silver spear with seams around in a cross form!.

content.detailedDescription: “some kind of malevolent alien harassing me, never seen it, it doesn't show itself physically but in communication they are a lot of things. i have been a victim for quite a while.” i have made a report over a year ago and its still actively tormenting me. just need elp and protection!
content.summary: “this entity communicates with me regularly and has the capacity to mind rape me and physically, without even being in the same place. i don’t know where it’s hiding. it’s not a craft, it’s a visiting cruel entity.”

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from dinner my wife and i saw a red orange ball moving horizontally across the sky. i'd say it was a little smaller than the moon and my original thought was it was like a flickering candle flame. only it didn't flicker. i can see patterns but they didn't move. i was driving so i kept my eyes on the road while glancing at the thing in the sky. when we reached our driveway we got out and watched it recede -- still in a straight line -- while another plane taking off from stewart airport (in nearby newburgh) was flying the opposite direction at a slight angle. when the thing became small in the distance (still bigger than a point-like star) it just turned itself off. we waited a bit to see if it would come on again but it didn't.

my thought when i was looking at the ufo was it looked like a candle flame. i was focusing on the bottom part where it was brightest — yellow in color — and shaped somewhat like the crescent of a moon without the pointed ends, and i only occasionally glanced at the top which i remember had small yellow or gold dots or orbs against a mostly orange-red and black background. at the moment i am certain i would recognize what i was looking at if i knew it — say chinese lantern or candle flame or lightning balls as a friend suggested — my mind is clearest when challenged. but it was none of those. and the sight of it was very clear. there was no cloud, wind, or fog. it was a clear night. i saw no riggings of any sort. just a red orange ball floating in the air at a constant speed in a singular direction. the best i can come up with whatever was inside the ball (“ball” actually didn’t occur to me to describe it — i only adopted it after reading other witnesses’ descriptions and i thought, yeah the whole thing was localized and since it wasn’t a square or a hexagon etc. it could be a ball) was that it was out-of-focus. my eyes were trying to focus and home in on the shapes inside it but can’t. also, the shapes i later realized were not moving. my mind at the time was telling me it’s a flame while at the same time asking so why isn’t it flickering?

i took a picture with my cellphone as it receded but it's just a white dot against a black sky. at least the exif data showed the date and time.

i guess when one sees something that can't be put into words, the brain works at a rapid pace presenting familiar objects and one by one ruling them out. in my case candle flame, hot air balloon, and even boiling water because of the yellow/gold dots/orbs on the top behaving like bubbles. but in each case, if i try to force myself to accept the "earthly" explanations, there is something that is off, sometimes way off. for example, flame that is not flickering, and is more like light whose source is distorted. and this is where debunkers "get" eyewitnesses. they'd say if it looks like a flame then it's a flame. but to the witness there is always something off.

it's probably like showing, say, a person in biblical times fluorescent light and showing it for only 2 minutes. the technology is so far ahead that the person cannot describe it to those who have not seen it.
content.summary: Red orange fireball in middletown, ny

content.detailedDescription: I was half a mile east from hwy 83 on fm 1025. its about two miles north of crystal city, texas. i was parked lights out observing traffic. when i noticed the lights i thought someone was trying to shine a light on me from above but with no beam. i got out of my vehicle starred at the two orbs for a few more seconds and they vanished. i didn't know what to make of it at first but then i realized it might have been a ufo. reason being is because right after that a fighter jet came out of nowhere and circled the area for approximately 10 minutes. it couldnt have been the jet because he was flying very fast zig zagging all around as if trying to locate it. there is a afb about two hours away in del rio, texas. i work shift work and its normal for us to see them training at night but this jet was solo. usually when i observe them training they are in twos and flying low. another coworker saw the same thing i did and at around the same time but he was on his way home on fm 481 heading towards hwy 57. we were about 65 miles apart. today when i was heading to work two fighter jets were headed in that direction at low altitude. this was around 2:45 pm. i was headed north on fm 481 towards hwy 90. this is the first for me.
content.summary: Two bright gold copper orb of ligjt. lasted about 20 secs and disapeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was out splitting wood, and took a rest. i observed a small black unit that was flying a straight west to east line. this is the second time i have seen this type of ufo. the first one i observed with a friend, and we thought it was a drone. it flew the same line, except it flew east near wcr 22 just west of the intersection of wcr 22 and 37.
the one that occurred on 7/31/2014 was the exact same craft. if i had to guess, i'd say it was about 300 feet of the ground, flying over wcr 18 w to e. it was flying at about 70 mph, and was totally noiseless. the only witness to the last one was my dog, who followed it with his eyes and growled at it. 
the first one i thought was a drone, and the second one could have been too, but the second one was closer to the ground, and i couldn't hear anything at all. 
the unit flew out of sight over the house, and i walked out to the front just in time to see it still on the same course, flying out of sight. we were having some winds (gusting 10 to 30 mph), from the nw, and it didn't seem to affect it one bit. after it passed, about 15 seconds later we had a strong gust of wind from the north. the birds cried out and took to the air, but perhaps it was the wind that did that.
i came in and brought up the program that follows all aircraft on the computer.
i thought i'd make a report and carry my camera with me just in case i see it again. my flight radar 24,com program didn't pick up anything, but that was a long shot to begin with because the craft was flying so low.
content.summary: Small totally black, flying straight line, no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
I first noticed two very bright orange lights from my bedroom window in the southeast sky at approx. 1202am on august 1st. moving closer to my window i noticed another round light joining them and moving in random motions. i then went outside and noticed more orange lights joining them and again rotating positions. around 5 lights were seen in all. i heard no noise. after about about two minutes the lights raised slightly and faded very quickly. 

the lights were larger/brighter then an airplane and in my opinion were very far away and estimate that most people in the city looking in that direction could see these lights. my guess is they were visible by most in the sacramento valley. they were very similar to the new years eve midnight siting in california (seen on youtube) and when i first saw them thats what i associated them with. would be curious if anyone noticed them
content.summary: First two bright orange lights, then several more, changing positions and finally lifting slighty and fading quickly

content.detailedDescription: Five bright orange -red lights passed overhead e to w making no sound and traveling about 50 to 60 mph i have five digital videos but i do not intend to turn over exclusive rights to these. as my property i own the copyrighrs and do not intend to give them away.
content.summary: Five objects traveling e to w about50 mph based non distance traveled and time observed

content.detailedDescription: A blinking or pulsating light appeared in the east by the horizon, i thought it was a shooting star but then it kept going. blinking as it streaked across the sky. it went from the horizon in the west to the horizon in the east and continued on to the east. it was impressive in that it did this remarkably fast. i'm not familiar with calculating air speed but it must have been in an order of magnitude around 100x that of a plane. in fact, the speed is what was remarkable about this incident.
content.summary: I saw extremely fast moving blinking/pulsating light cross the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north from bismarck n d on hwy 83 on route to minot about 4 miles out of bismarck i looked to the east and i seen what seemed to be a airplane way to low i thought it was going to crash since i knew the airport was on the south side of the city it was to low to make it that far it looked like it was moving north to south anyway the more i looked at it the craft was flying east to west i was looking for lights and nothing was there so i started looking for a nose and a tail and nothing was there then i seen it up close it was awsome 170 feet in the air one quarter mile away bright gold color i examined it on each end was what i call fish lips it had 7 huge windows in front 4 on the left then a space and 3 on the right the fishlips seemed to devide top and bottom the windows full top and bottom it then deployed a vessel using a particle light on to the surface of the earth and flew away i then seen the tail it had 20 foot tail wings that were like a v shape the vessel was a round shape i could only see the bottom half it connected by a green gassie ring that connected it to the elevator light  it dropped a 4000 lb vessel at a rate of 10 feet per second very slow the vessel was  orange it had definition on the bottom black spots i believe it was put into water and i think its still here today gathering information it may have killed fish in said water after it dropped the vessels it turned and flew back east
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: I had seen a ufo that droped a vessel  onto the serface of the earth and did so with a particle light type thing and flew away

content.detailedDescription: This is twice i've seen this object first time it hovered over my car with a bright beam on my car scared me and a friend and never spoke of it until i saw it again last night,but i live next to ft rucker military base which trains soldiers to fly apatchi helicopters and kinds of helicopter,but this time the ufo was following the helicopter and then another helicopter came after the ufo that's was following the other helicopter which was a student helicopter , the helicopter that came was attack helicopter known a an apache sorry i spelled it wrong,and then the ufo and the apache kinda danced a little i guess u could say went round each other then the ufo took off , i know it was the same thing i was ten yrs ago that hovered my car but i was afraid to say anything but know i've seen it twice i know i'm not crazy , which ft rucker will deny it but it happend
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hoverd moved fast and changed direction fast

content.detailedDescription: In the early morning went out on a balcony to breathe crisp air, something  pushed on an idea to take picture sky. did 2 pictures with a difference in 5-6 sec, then noticed a quickly retiring object which had time to get on these 2 pictures. noise and high light was not observed. round an object there is discharged of air, like plasma.
content.summary: An unknown quickly moving object  got in a shot in the early morning on july, 14, ukraine.

content.detailedDescription: It was just like the videos ive seen of triangles on youtube it was to dim to be caputred on my camera. it appeared orbital unfortunatly due to light polution and forest fire smoke.  i couldnt see if it was blocking stars.It did not appear to have unworldy preformance just the speed of your average satilite.
content.summary: Triangle 2 back lights brighter than front

content.detailedDescription: This is the second night i have seen this star like event, tonight it isn't doing the same pattern as it did last night. last night was very grid like, tonight it is sporadic, no real pattern, but staying in the same area and it showed up about 3 mins earlier then did last night..12:12/13ish today, yesterday was just after 12:15.
content.summary: I reported the same thing last night, pretty much the same thing

content.detailedDescription: My best friend and i were driving back home from our friend's house in millville, nj. we got off at the exit with the ramada.. and that's when we both seen this triangular shaped object with glowing white and blue lights surrounding it.. it was hovering over the ramada.. then it flew to the right and then up.. then it just vanished. it was faster than a plane but slower than a shooting star. the whole thing lasted about 10 seconds. we automatically knew what it was. we turned and looked at each other with wide eyes. freaked out a little. we called the friend we were just hanging out with and told him about it. our hearts were racing. we were actually pretty excited about it.. freaked out, shocked, but excited. we still talk about it to this day.
content.summary: Triangular object with glowing blue and white light surrounding it. hovered, flew straight, up, and vanished.
